title: Spaghetti with Garlic, Parsley and Chilli
ingredients: ['200g spaghetti', '3 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1/4 teaspoon chilli flakes', '1/2 bunch fresh parsley, chopped', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'freshly grated Parmesan cheese to serve']
